## FontMode enumeration

Font size mode.

```csharp
public enum FontMode
```

### Values

| Name | Value | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Auto | `0` | Automatically calculate Font size based on barcode size. |
| Manual | `1` | Use Font sized defined by user. |
